data.title: HIPPO - Merino Wool Short Neck Tube
data.meta_description: The Hippo is a short soft merino neck tube to keep your neck warm. Great for hiking, skiing, outdoors use or on the range. It is compact and versatile.
data.text:
£27.50

Colour

Black

Light Olive

Natural White

Coyote Brown

Product information

Soft and durable short neck tube with flattened seams for increased comfort. The ideal weight for extra warmth around your neck on cold days.

Armadillo Merino Hippo is easy care, machine washable and quick drying.

Features:

Short neck tube with flattened seams

Tube length - 29cm (11.4in)

Discrete logo placement

Technical Specifications

Fabric weight: 170g/m2 = 5.0oz/yd2

Fabric: 100% Merino Wool, Jersey Knit

Garment weight: 32g = 1.12oz

Micron: 18.5 Micron itch-free merino

Stitching: Flatlock chaffing free stitching, with extra strong thread

Designed for: Cold weather neck coverage

Benefits: No melt or drip, no smell and super comfortable 365 days a year

Designed in the UK, made in Lithuania

Style Number: 21302

Washing instructions

Machine wash at 40°C (warm), line dry or tumble dry low heat.

Shipping and returns

Same-day shipping. Order before 1500 UK time

Free shipping on all UK orders and International orders over £100

Hassle-free returns
